imdb.plot outline: This documentary series is the outcome of enthusiasm by young researchers for increasing connections between the fundamental research performed at the Institute of Vertebrate Biology ASCR, Brno, and Czech universities aimed at practical applications in nature conservation management. They have produced "Stories of Curious Scientists," a documentary series broadcasted by Czech Television.
imdb.title: Pribehy zvedavych prirodovedcu
plot: This documentary series is the outcome of enthusiasm by young researchers for increasing connections between the fundamental research performed at the Institute of Vertebrate Biology ASCR, Brno, and Czech universities aimed at practical applications in nature conservation management.
